uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.mechanism.helper

Class AtomAtomMappingContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.mechanism.helper.AtomAtomMappingContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AtomAtomMappingContainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class maintain the atom-atom mapping of a reaction between reactants and products
    Author:
    Syed Asad Rahman , Lorenzo Baldacci {lorenzo@ebi.ac.uk|lbaldacc@csr.unibo.it}
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getMappedProductAtom

        public org.openscience.cdk.interfaces.IAtom getMappedProductAtom(org.openscience.cdk.interfaces.IAtom reactantAtom)
        The method returns the product atom mapped to the reactant atom passed as parameter. Returns null if the reactantAtom is not mapped to any product atom.
        Parameters:
        reactantAtom - The IAtom for which the product atom is required.
        Returns:
        The product atom mapped to the given reactant atom.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The idx-th a reactant atom mapped.
